toggle-toggle-sprint.name: Toggle Toggle Sprint
toggle-toggle-sprint.noYacl: This requires Yet Another Config Lib to be installed!
toggle-toggle-sprint.potentiallyCheaty: Some servers may consider this feature to be a cheat, use at your own risk!
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintOnDeath.descr: As of 1.20.1, the game will release all toggled keys when the player respawns, including the Sprint key.
This feature prevents vanilla from releasing your sprint key, ensuring that you continue to sprint after respawning.
Note that this feature only affects the Sprint key, and all other toggle keys (such as the Sneak key) will still be released.
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintOnJoin.descri: If enabled, you'll start sprinting when loading into a world if your Sprint control is set to Toggle
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.descrip: Changes your default state for sprinting
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.on: Your Sprint control will be changed to Toggle when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.off: Your Sprint control will be changed to Hold when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.unchang: Your Sprint control won't be modified when joining a world
When enabled, the toggle key will also simulate a Sprint key press when activated if you're not already sprinting
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakOnJoin.descrip: If enabled, you'll start sneaking when loading into a world if your Sneak control is set to Toggle
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.descript: Changes the default state for your Sneak control
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.on: Your Sneak control will be changed to Toggle when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.off: Your Sneak control will be changed to Hold when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.unchange: Your Sneak control won't be modified when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.alsoStartSneaking.d: When enabled, the toggle key will also simulate a Sneak key press when activated if you're not already sneaking
